attributes.action: Change the rating of Kabali to a 12 so that families can watch together.
attributes.additional_details: Films such as Theri was much much more violent and bloodier.
attributes.background: Basically the film wasn't even violent and they the people who certificated Kabali have purposely rated the film 15 so the film distributors who have published it to Europe and Canada lose out on money.

rejection.details:
Film classifications are the responsibility of the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC), which is independent. You can find out more about the BBFC here: 

http://www.bbfc.co.uk/
